scripts.minify:html: html-minifier --minify-css true --minify-js true --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --keep-closing-slash --file-ext html --input-dir src --output-dir dist
scripts.minify:images: cp -r src/assets/images dist/assets/images && cp src/favicon.ico dist/favicon.ico
scripts.copy:data: cp src/sitemap.xml dist/sitemap.xml && cp src/robots.txt dist/robots.txt
scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && npm run minify:html && npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js && npm run minify:images && npm run copy:data
